name: Lights out (itch) (Sasha Legrand)
description:
Dive into a frightening universe where danger is omnipresent. Play with light and shadow to survive and make your way through various puzzles.

Creators
  •  Sasha Legrand - Programmer - https://sasha-legrand.itch.io/
  • Osvaldo - Programmer
  • Léa Roulee - Designer

  • Olivier Tournade - Designer
